entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403602}This is the Monastery... a sacred{F801}place where those who serve God gather...{F801}{F802}Since you are here, you must be among{F801}we who serve the Lord. Let us help each{F801}other dedicate ourselves to the kingdom.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403602}I heard that there was a skirmish{F801}amongst the young Samurai...{F801}{F802}These things happen when one is prideful{F801}of the power he possesses. We must be{F801}watchful to keep to our assigned roles.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403602}I heard that there was a skirmish{F801}amongst the young Samurai...{F801}{F802}These things happen when one is prideful{F801}of the power he possesses. We must be{F801}watchful to keep to our assigned roles.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Our role is to study the lost wisdom{F801}and knowledge for the kingdom's sake.{F801}{F802}We have already scoured the areas of{F801}Naraku where the code permits the{F801}Samurai to venture...{F801}{F802}So you do Abbot Hugo a disservice by{F801}holding a grudge. We are only playing{F801}our parts; that is all.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Our role is to study the lost wisdom{F801}and knowledge for the kingdom's sake.{F801}{F802}We have already scoured the areas of{F801}Naraku where the code permits the{F801}Samurai to venture...{F801}{F802}So you do Abbot Hugo a disservice by{F801}holding a grudge. We are only playing{F801}our parts; that is all.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403602}It was Sister Gabby who proposed that{F801}we hold a public execution for the{F801}Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}The Sabbaths caused pilgrimages of{F801}the people from village to village...{F801}leading to an exchange of ideas.{F801}{F802}Presumptions and hearsay will induce{F801}fear and anxiety. This execution will{F801}dispel it and right the people again.{F801}{F802}Small wonder Abbot Hugo calls her the{F801}Right Hand... Her vision is all-{F801}encompassing, as God's would be...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403602}It was Sister Gabby who proposed that{F801}we hold a public execution for the{F801}Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}The Sabbaths caused pilgrimages of{F801}the people from village to village...{F801}leading to an exchange of ideas.{F801}{F802}Presumptions and hearsay will induce{F801}fear and anxiety. This execution will{F801}dispel it and right the people again.{F801}{F802}Small wonder Abbot Hugo calls her the{F801}Right Hand... Her vision is all-{F801}encompassing, as God's would be...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403621}The dead have resurrected!? Who would{F801}believe such nonsense!?{F801}{F802}It was you Samurai who executed the{F801}Black Samurai, yes?{F801}{F802}Do not make me suspect foul play{F801}among you... I should hate to think{F801}she had assistance in her escape...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Abbot Hugo has relayed a message from{F801}our new leaders...{F801}{F802}The threat of the Black Samurai is{F801}forever passed. The kingdom's peace and{F801}prosperity are secured...{F801}{F802}Now... let us hope that the people will{F801}not neglect to revere God...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Abbot Hugo has relayed a message from{F801}our new leaders...{F801}{F802}The threat of the Black Samurai is{F801}forever passed. The kingdom's peace and{F801}prosperity are secured...{F801}{F802}Now... let us hope that the people will{F801}not neglect to revere God...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Our years of research shall surely be{F801}useful if we are to lead the people{F801}to Tokyo.{F801}{F802}The Monastery concealed itself at first{F801}when the new authorities arrived...{F801}{F802}But this strikes me as an ideal chance{F801}to let the people know of our wondrous{F801}deeds.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Intelligent monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Our years of research shall surely be{F801}useful if we are to lead the people{F801}to Tokyo.{F801}{F802}The Monastery concealed itself at first{F801}when the new authorities arrived...{F801}{F802}But this strikes me as an ideal chance{F801}to let the people know of our wondrous{F801}deeds.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}I saw you in the Rite yesterday. I think{F801}congratulations are in order...{F801}{F802}Yesterday, you died as a Casualry,{F801}and were born anew as a Samurai.{F801}{F802}You are among the Luxurors now, and as{F801}such, it is your duty to be a leader{F801}for the people.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403621}There seems to be a strange trend among{F801}the Casualries...{F801}{F802}Though those who need to be are already{F801}aware of it. Let us wait and see what{F801}comes of it...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403601}Abbot Hugo is attending the all-night{F801}meeting now, together with Commander{F801}Hope and Sister Gabby.{F801}{F802}The matter of people turning into{F801}demons is one of national security...{F801}{F802}We must ban these Sabbaths and destroy{F801}demons wherever they appear. And, of{F801}course, apprehend the Black Samurai.{F801}{F802}There are so many issues which only{F801}Abbot Hugo can judge...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403642}Abbot Hugo is resting himself after{F801}the meeting with Sir Hope.{F801}{F802}According to Abbot Hugo, he plead with{F801}Sir Hope to take command in Tokyo...{F801}{F802}But night upon night of persuasion was{F801}futile, and Sir Hope never agreed.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403601}Sister Gabby has gone to the Obelisk{F801}Plaza.{F801}{F802}This new trouble is hitting us hard,{F801}and the excitement of the execution{F801}hasn't yet diminished...{F801}{F802}I'm sure she merely needed a bit of{F801}fresh air.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403621}I've not seen Sister Gabby for some{F801}time.{F801}{F802}Usually, Abbot Hugo can be heard crying{F801}out for her as soon as he notices her{F801}absence...{F801}{F802}But lately, he holds his tongue, as if{F801}he respects her. Or fears her...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403621}I've not seen Sister Gabby for some{F801}time.{F801}{F802}Usually, Abbot Hugo can be heard crying{F801}out for her as soon as he notices her{F801}absence...{F801}{F802}But lately, he holds his tongue, as if{F801}he respects her. Or fears her...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403622}Abbot Hugo is very quick on his feet.{F801}He was utterly insistent on gathering{F801}mystic relics until the other day...{F801}{F802}Er, no... th-that was a compliment.{F801}He, too, is one of the kingdom's{F801}people, chosen by God...{F801}{F802}Oh, please do not breathe a word of{F801}this to the others at Obelisk Plaza!{F801}Thank you...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}New Samurai are very rare. We don't see{F801}them every year. But this year, we even{F801}have a female recruit...{F801}{F802}She comes from a family that has given{F801}us many excellent monks. Of course,{F801}this is a loss for the Monastery...{F801}{F802}But I'm sure she will provide beauty and{F801}grace to the man's world of the Samurai{F801}order.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403742}Isabeau was just visiting us. She{F801}wished to pray before departing...{F801}{F802}Though she is young, she has a{F801}laudable soul. May God be with her{F801}wherever she goes...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403741}Isabeau was just visiting us. She was{F801}seeking flowers to bring to some of{F801}the wounded fellows.{F801}{F802}Her concern for her fellows, even while{F801}on leave, is touching... She is a very{F801}kind-hearted girl.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}According to historical documents, there{F801}was indeed a great deal of magic in the{F801}Unclean Ones' country. {F801}{F802}By pursuing the Black Samurai, you will{F801}be a living testament to that history...{F801}{F802}Considering that Abbot Hugo granted you{F801}this opportunity, you should be grateful{F801}to him.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403721}I have heard that we are going to devote{F801}fewer of our resources to recovering{F801}mystic relics...{F801}{F802}Abbot Hugo will not be pleased, I'm{F801}sure. But such are our new leaders'{F801}orders.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403721}By the by, I see less of Isabeau lately.{F801}{F802}I understand that she is traveling to{F801}many places on the word of Commander{F801}Hope.{F801}{F802}It was a shame what happened to{F801}Navarre... And now Jonathan and Walter{F801}are also missing.{F801}{F802}I believe that makes you the only fresh{F801}Samurai left in this kingdom...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,1,400703}Damn that Black Samurai... She's been{F801}vexing enough thus far...{F801}{F802}Oh, hello. You're cooking up something{F801}with Gabby these days, aren't you?{F801}{F802}Do let me know if it's anything{F801}important, won't you?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,1,400703}Damn that Black Samurai... She's been{F801}vexing enough thus far...{F801}{F802}Oh, hello. You're cooking up something{F801}with Gabby these days, aren't you?{F801}{F802}Do let me know if it's anything{F801}important, won't you?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,1,400711}So you've met our new leaders, correct?{F801}...Very well.{F801}{F802}We're very busy compiling a history of{F801}our kingdom at the moment.{F801}{F802}Of course we will have to include the{F801}exiled king in this history...{F801}{F802}It gives me a strange sense of nostalgia.{F801}My thoughts turn to the Unclean Ones'{F801}banishment 1,500 years past...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,1,400801}To wear the uniform of the Counter-{F801}Demon Force founded to bring peace,{F801}and instead threaten our safety...{F801}{F802}The Black Samurai is a blight upon the{F801}prosperity of this kingdom. entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,1,400801}Please mind your step on the way to{F801}Shinjuku National Park.{F801}{F802}You must be a savior to the people,{F801}for the kingdom's new millennium.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Sharp-eyed monk\0{F87A,42}{F813,1,403641}Only a few in the castle are aware that{F801}there are demons within Naraku.{F801}{F802}No one would dream that there are demons{F801}just beyond the castle wall...{F801}{F802}It is a careful decision on the{F801}Monastery's part to keep our silence.{F801}To let it be known would create panic...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}Isabeau just came to see us. She wanted{F801}to offer her thanks to God for her{F801}success in the training exercises.{F801}{F802}Though she is young, she has a{F801}laudable soul. May God be with her{F801}wherever she goes...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}Isabeau just came to see us. She wanted{F801}to offer her thanks to God for her{F801}success in the training exercises.{F801}{F802}Though she is young, she has a{F801}laudable soul. May God be with her{F801}wherever she goes...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403742}Isabeau was just visiting us. She begged{F801}forgiveness for the foolish deeds{F801}conducted by some of her fellows.{F801}{F802}She has a generous spirit that cares{F801}for others... May God be with her{F801}wherever she goes.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403742}Isabeau was just visiting us. She begged{F801}forgiveness for the foolish deeds{F801}conducted by some of her fellows.{F801}{F802}She has a generous spirit that cares{F801}for others... May God be with her{F801}wherever she goes.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reserved monk\0{F87A,43}{F813,1,403702}Ah, my dear {F843,0}. I did not{F801}know you were still in the kingdom.{F801}{F802}I am going to be sure no one is left{F801}behind in this place before heading{F801}for Tokyo.{F801}{F802}I will see you in Shinjuku.{F801}
